column2:
This one's always a hit - ha, ha. Tank Warriors is another part of the Terminal 2 Network.

You can also launch this game through the Pathways or the Desktop.

Did you know that in the early 1900s, 'tank' was originally meant to be a code-name?

It was used to fool the enemy into thinking that these new 'tanks' were just for hauling water or gasoline. Clever.

Uh-oh! I'm detecting that `Tank Warriors` isn't installed!

You need to download it from the App Center if you want to play.

Click the icon named `More Apps` on the Desktop, then search for the program you want to install.
Design, program, or pilot a tiny tank to victory!
